item.description:
The Scholarship Committe will meet at Gloria's home in Windsor to review all of the applications and make a decision on who to nominate for a scholarship this year.  All who would like to help are welcome to join us.

 

Because this is at a private home, you  must RSVP to get the address and directions.
item.why: Every year, Hartford Heights Tall Club gives a scholarship to a tall, graduating high school senior. Come help us read the applications and make the decision.
item.name: Scholarship Committee Meeting
